{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = RB260GS front.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 5 ports Gigabit PoE in Ethernet Smart Switch |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/RB260GS |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = MikroTik_RB260GS |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = RB260GS |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = (CSS106-5G-1S) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/10/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/MikroTik_RB260GS |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- ethoui -->
|cpu1chip1 = Taifatech;TF-470;TF-470-BCL; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 50 |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SST;; |flash1size = 128 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 96 KiB |ram1chip = Taifatech;TF-470;TF-470-BCL;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327; |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 5 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sfp_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = passive |pwr_poe = 11-30 |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = SwitchOS;;;
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = PoE in, SFP cage, plastic case |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:RB260GS front.jpg| File:RB260GS back.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== *[[Project:Network/Hardware Specific/MikroTik/Switch]] *[[MikroTik RB260GS]] (CSS106-5G-1S) • 5x LAN GbE, PoE, 1x SFP • [https://mikrotik.com/product/RB260GS PPage] *[[MikroTik RB250GS]] • 5x LAN GbE, PoE; 4MB Flash/96KB SRAM :Taifatech TF-470 (50MHz RISC)/[[Atheros]] AR8316 (1GbE), SwOS
